title: Solo: Book One
description: Collecting the first 94 pages of Hope Larson's independent web comic, Solo is the story of Leah Turcio, who until very recently was one half of the husband/wife band The Junior Twins. Now she is forced to cope with both the breakup of her band, and her marriage. Solo is the first long-form comic Larson has both written and illustrated since 2010's Eisner Award-winning Mercury.
author: Hope Larson
